__e: Since you met my colleague, give us a minute to change your mind. Please.
You give us just a moment inside that room, and then tell us whether we belong in your wagon.
Before it does, give us a moment of grace.
Give us one animal a day and you'll get what you need.
Just give us a few hours to figure out what's going on here, okay?
Give us agreeable weather to make guarding your cause easier.
Give us faith, Indeed faith In our sons, faith In one another.
Look, charge us or let us go.
God grant us the serenity to accept the things we cannot change, courage to change the things we can, and wisdom to know the difference.
"Pal, once in a while give us a chance to do social service."
Well, listen, if you think of anything else that might be helpful, please, give us a call.
Give us an hour and maybe he'll tell us where she is.
Mr. Johnson, if you'll excuse us, we'll leave you alone a few minutes. Come on, girls.
Would you excuse us for a moment, please?
Um... Uh, excuse us while our lives end.
Give us the room number and you walk away from here.
So you want to keep doing business in this town, give us the name that is on the tip of your tongue right now.
Give us his name and we'll stop assuming that that man is you.
